name: Super Funky Disco Snake
description:
You are a super funky, you like to disco - you are the Super Funky Disco Snake!

A rhythm driven game of snake, with a dynamic soundtrack and a lot of underfloor lighting. Collect fruit and progress through the portals to complete the levels. This is a work in progress so there may be bugs / performance issues.

For best results, use the Windows build (the one I've tested the most!)

I've also included a Safe Mode, in which you can play the game without worrying about colliding with a wall or colliding with your tail. It's also there because it's quite difficult and I haven't done much to balance the difficulty of the game!

Controls

Arrow keys or WASD to control the direction of the snake.

Escape to exit to the main menu.
